solution_line_template: The number of times Jason goes to the library per week is {jason_multiplier} * {william_visits_per_week} = <<{jason_multiplier}*{william_visits_per_week}={jason_visits_per_week}>>{jason_visits_per_week} times.
The number of times he goes to the library in {num_weeks} weeks is {jason_visits_per_week} * {num_weeks} = <<{jason_visits_per_week}*{num_weeks}={jason_total_visits}>>{jason_total_visits} times.
